issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

some users are experiencing failures when trying to add provisioning profiles to Titanium Developer

{html}

comments.body:
{html}

Although this ticket is marked as resolved, I cannot get it to work on 0.8.
When I upload my Development Provision Profile, the status bar says "Loading new provisioning profile.." and hangs infinitely.

This was the first result on Google, hence my posting :)

{html}

{html}

I'm using the latest pre-built version (reported by the app as 0.8.0) and when I create an app it is reported as using 0.8.1 SDK.

The app still hangs when I attempt to load my provisioning profile. I'm not sure what other information I can provide, but I am happy to.

{html}
